Compatible with iOS 10
Not compatible with iOS 11 Electra

LockWatch brings an almost perfect recreation of most of the watch faces included in watchOS 4 – right to your iOS LockScreen.

It works just like Apple Watch: Force touch a watch face to enter selection mode, swipe through all available Watch Faces and select the one you like, or customize it the way you want. On devices that do not feature 3D Touch, you can long press to enter selection mode. To leave selection mode, either tap on a Watch Face or press the home button.

Included Watch Faces:
• Activity Analog
• Activity Digital
• Numerals (Regular and Rounded style only)
• Utility
• Simple
• Color
• Chronograph
• X-Large

A Weather Face is also planned. Most of the Watch Faces can also be colored in one of the 40 colors supported in watchOS 4.

Special Thanks to Anthony Bouchard for his greatmotivating me to work on LockWatch again!
